author: hwright
msg: Don't allow repositories to be created inside existing repositories.
This is a user-requested fix, which potentially leads to confusion.

author: hwright
msg: Make libsvn_ra_neon initialization thread-safe: fix a race condition where
if two neon requests are started at approximately at the same time, one
call starts initializing and the other call thinks initialization is
already completed. (r32510 is a minor code simplification)
Fixes a reproducable crash when performing dav requests via multiple
threads at the same time (reported as issue on the SharpSvn users list).

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3258: 8lock.t fails in non-English locale.

author: kfogel
msg: * STATUS: Move a change to the 'Approved' section.

author: kfogel
msg: * STATUS: Vote for r32636, r32639 (disallow creating a repos inside a repos).
